summary: This document consists of Bureau of Prisons count sheets and inmate roster records from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 9, 2019. It includes official inmate counts by housing unit and assignment records, with specific notations for suicide watch and hospital assignments.

events.title: Daily inmate count at MCC New York
events.description: Official inmate count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, showing 758 total inmates across various housing units.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, NY
keyFacts: Document shows prison administrative records from August 9, 2019 - the day Jeffrey Epstein died in custody.
Records include inmate counts and assignments at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
The document contains specific housing unit codes (B-A, C-A, E-N, G-N, G-S, H-A, I-N, K-N, K-S, R-A, Z-A, Z-B) with inmate totals.
Mentions suicide watch assignments (SUICIDE OR) in the inmate roster section.
Total inmate count recorded as 758 at the time of the official count.
